name: Catch The Ant
description:
This is a logical game in which you are fighting against a clever opponent - the Ant.
Your goal is to close the chain of stones around the ant.
The goal of the ant is to escape from the playing field.

You alternately make moves:
The first move is made by the player: You put the three stones in any free cells.
In response, the ant moves to one of the neighboring cells.

All next moves: You add one stone, and the ant moves to one of the neighboring cells.

Your goal is to cut off all possible exits.

Catch the ant!
